code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SupplierDetails(){const[suppliers,setSuppliers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://localhost:5600/suppliers").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setSuppliers(data.results));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"mb-4",children:"Supplier Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Supplier ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Supplier Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Phone Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Number of Products"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:Array.isArray(suppliers)&&suppliers.map(supplier=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.supplier_id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.supplier_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.pno}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.no_of_products})]},supplier.supplier_id))})]})]});}export default SupplierDetails;
